mapper.select: SELECT A.FXA_INFO_ID as fxaInfoId ,A.FXA_NO as fxaNo ,A.FXA_NM as fxaNm ,A.WBS_CD as wbsCd ,ISNULL(SUBSTRING(B.PRJ_NM, 8, LEN(B.PRJ_NM)), DBO.FN_GETDEPTNAME(A.DEPT_CD)) as prjNm ,DBO.FN_GETSABUNNAME(A.CRGR_ID) as crgrNm ,A.FXA_CLSS as fxaClss ,A.FXA_LOC as fxaLoc ,A.FXA_QTY as fxaQty ,A.FXA_SPC as fxaSpc ,A.FXA_ST_CD as fxaStCd ,A.FXA_UTM_NM as fxaUtmNm ,A.BKP_PCE as bkpPce ,A.CRGR_ID as crgrId ,A.DEPT_CD as deptCd ,A.DSU_DT as dsuDt ,A.OBT_PCE as obtPce ,A.RLIS_DT as rlisDt ,A.MK_NM as mkNm ,A.OBT_DT as obtDt ,A.USE_USF as useUsf ,ISNULL(A.TAG_YN,'N') as tagYn ,A.PRC_DPT as prcDpt ,C.TRSF_APPR_DT as trsfApprDt ,CASE WHEN C.TRSF_ST_CD = 'REJ' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END as trsfYn ,F.FIL_PATH as imgFilPath ,F.FIL_NM as imgFilNm ,F.ATTC_FIL_ID as attcFilId ,F.SEQ as seq FROM IRIS_FXA_INFO_MST a LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_WBS_PJT_IF B ON B.WBS_CD = A.WBS_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_FXA_TRSF_LIST C ON C.FXA_INFO_ID = A.FXA_INFO_ID AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_COM_ATTC_FIL F ON F.ATTC_FIL_ID = A.ATTC_FIL_ID AND F.DEL_YN ='N' WHERE A.FXA_INFO_ID = #{fxaInfoId}
